sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap'; const IntroductionFeatures = () => (
Introduction

EasyDEV is a modern dashboard template based on React Components and Bootstrap 4 Framework. We’ve used modern technologies and best practices to make our product easy to work with. It’s the most convenient template for developers, because of React Components, clean code and detailed documentation, which allows you to build any projects easily! Use it for e-commerce, analytics, sports and other types of web or mobile applications.

Here is our discord server!  Click here to join now.

If you want to get the HTML EasyDev template for free you’ll need to:

1. join our  Discord server;

2. write a private message with your purchase code and e-mail to Alexey, the admin (green nickname);

3. wait a bit and get your template within a day that’s it! :)

Features
  • Bootstrap 4 Stable (4.0.0)
  • Fully Responsive Layout
  • SASS Powered
  • 100+ Pages
  • Free Icon Fonts
  • 200+ UI Elements
  • Dashboard Cards & Widgets
  • Shop and Listing Cards & Widgets
  • Responsive Navbar Menu
  • 3 Kinds of Charts (Recharts, Chart.js, React-vis)
  • Form Validation
  • Form Wizards
  • React WYSIWYG Editor
  • Material-ui
  • Redux
  • React Final Form
  • React Router 4
  • React-smooth-scrollbar
  • Reactstrap (Bootstrap 4 components)
  • React-slick
  • React-big-calendar
  • Colored Tables and DataTables
  • Google and Vector Maps
  • Two Color Themes
  • Unlimited Theme Possibilities
  • FREE Lifetime Updates
  • and much much more…
 ); export default IntroductionFeatures;
